name: Noclip
desc: Makes the player invincible.

name: No Spikes
desc: Ignores spike objects.

name: No Hitbox
desc: Disables all object hitboxes. Special objects are disabled.

name: No Solids
desc: Disables most solid hitboxes. Special objects still work.

name: Suicide
desc: Kills the player repeatedly.

name: Freeze Player
desc: Freezes player movement.

name: No Mirror Transition
desc: Prevents the screen from being flipped upon a mirror portal.

name: Instant Mirror Portal
desc: Reverse portal now instantly switches.

name: Jump Hack
desc: Allows for jumping in mid-air.

name: Instant Complete
desc: Instantly completes the level. (Do not enable in the Editor)

name: Force Platformer Mode
desc: Forces you to be in platformer mode when playing a level.

name: Hide Player
desc: Hides the player. (Requires playing the level again)

name: No Trail
desc: Disables any trail effect from the player.

name: No Rotate
desc: Freezes the player from rotating when jumping, or falling.

name: No Wave Trail
desc: Disables the trail behind the wave.

name: Solid Wave Trail
desc: Removes the blending of both icon colors on the wave trail.

name: Instant Respawn
desc: Removes the delay when re-attempting the level.

name: No Death Effect
desc: Removes explosion particles when a player dies.

name: No Wave Pulse
desc: Prevents the wave from pulsing to the beat of the music.

name: Wave Pulse Size
desc: How big the pulse should be for the wave.

name: Change Gravity
desc: Allows you to change gravity when jumping or falling.

name: Gravity Value
desc: The value the gravity should be set to.

name: Auto Clicker
desc: Automatically clicks for you.

name: Clicks per second
desc: The amount of times the auto clicker should click every second.
